message.body: are PRs for enhancements/fixes being accepted to this repo? Or is it restricted at the moment?
@hhes great =) I'll grab some smaller ones until I get familiar enough with things
is there a current branch that this work is happening on? Or is it still in discussion?

What's the roadmap for this as well? Is it a community drive change or something internal first? IE: given the new basic project structure, will anyone be able to pick off an issue related to the re-write?
@erkan probably, but it will be much faster to start it right now while the UI is fairly sparse =)
